body:
So, Some of you "Friends" :D Wanted to see some interesting videos i find on youtube, or just flat out funny.. So i have not heard from a mod that this is Illegal, So im fine if this gets locked... So without further a due lets get right into it:

Coming in, in todays video is: Gritzalem with a funny *Gorilla* video that will sure to make your day xD

"How i usually PVP (On badlion)". I do not know how he comes up with these but they are SOO funny! 

*You may also suggest videos in the Discussion part of this thread. August 10th, 2014 Sunday 7:17 PM
